actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income interest on certain industrial development bonds the proceeds of which are to be used to furnish railroad transportation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest on industrial development bonds whose proceeds are to be used to furnish railroad transportation facilities, including rolling stock.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income interest on certain industrial development bonds the proceeds of which are to be used to furnish railroad transportation.
